subject: Refund request
description_text:
Hello, my order # is SSN2038. I saw your pedals with the haptic feedback on
Amazon for over $100 less. Is it possible to get a refund? I will still
purchase the pedals just from Amazon. Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Britton Seadon,  Sorry, your individual has already shipped and we are no longer able to cancel it for you. The Amazon price plus tax is about the same as the official website, so you can go to the checkout page and take a look.

No worries, I double checked and I had the plus x instead of the pro x in
the amazon cart. However, the total on Amazon for the pro x including
haptics $670 and I still paid $720 from the website. Is there any way to
get back the difference? Thanks for the reply

On Fri, Jul 18, 2025, 2:56â€¯a.m. service@simsonn.com
